text: Kiernan Shipka. Today being Friday the 13th, Kiernan Shipka has chosen an appropriately spooky time to share a first glimpse at Chilling Adventures of Sabrina, Netflix ’ s dark, broody, and otherwise Riverdale - esque take on Sabrina the Teenage Witch. Wearing the headband that appears in the show ’ s poster art but otherwise dressed in civvies, Shipka introduces everyone to the show ’ s coven, including Miranda Otto and Lucy Davis as Aunts Zelda and Hilda. Roberto Aguirre - Sacasa, who created Chilling Adventures as well as Riverdale, also shared a brief teaser for the series on Twitter.
